MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to dissemminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Linux,Linux Console,Linux GPL,Linux Open Source,Mac OS X,MS-DOS,OS/2,Unix,Win 3.1x,Win95,Win98,Windows CE,Windows Vista Business,Windows Vista Enterprise,Windows Vista Home Basic,Windows Vista Home Premium,Windows Vista Starter,Windows Vista Ultimate,Windows2000,Windows2003,WinME,WinNT 3.x,WinNT 4.x,WinXP
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Portability tweaks to make it work even in old UNIX versions of SED.

English.Keywords: sed, free, game, sokoban, interactive, script, console, terminal, stream editor, Unix, Linux, Mac, Windows, CLI, GPL
English.Char_Desc_45: The classic Sokoban game written in SED!
English.Char_Desc_80: The classic Sokoban game reincarnated in SED, the good old UNIX Stream EDitor.
English.Char_Desc_250: The classic Sokoban game reincarnated again, this time in SED. Yes, that sed! The good old UNIX Stream EDitor you used in the console days to s/substitute/words/g.
English.Char_Desc_450: The classic Sokoban game reincarnated again, this time in SED. Yes, that sed! The good old UNIX Stream EDitor you used in the console days to s/substitute/words/g. Note that it's cool because it's SED. Don't expect an amazing gameplay.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
The classic Sokoban game reincarnated again, this time in SED. Yes, that sed! The good old UNIX Stream EDitor you used in the console days to s/substitute/words/g.
Detailed instructions are available on the script's headers.
Note: It's cool because it's SED. Don't expect an amazing gameplay.
